ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout) 13.7 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence limits of 12.0 to 15.8 mg/l), flow through, Method; Committee on Methods for Toxicity Tests with Aquatic Organisms, EPA 660/3-75-009, 975. /Industry-Sponsored Analysis of Data/

LC50 Mysidopsis bahia 0.39 mg/l/96 hr (95% confidence interval of 0.34 to 0.44 mg/l), static, Method: OECD Guideline 202, part 1 "Daphnia sp., Acute Immobilisation Test" /Industry-Sponsored Analysis of Data/
